data.actual_result: The floating menu is smaller than others,, the text is small and blurry.
data.expected_result: The floating menu and text is the same size as all the others in the interface.
data.short_description: "Three dots" menu is small and blurry in proportion to the interface on message option.
data.steps_to_repro: - Set your application scaling to 90% - Send a message in any channel - Click on the three dots at the right of that message - Observe the smallness
